summary: Page 83 (left side), chapter 5. Two continuation fragments from section 108, then sections 109-114 with grouping header 'shonot'. Section 114 cut off at bottom (continues to next page). Structure well captured.

issues.description: OCR has 'שבברכין בעין הרע' but image shows 'שמברכין בעין הרע'. The shin-bet (שב) should be shin-mem (שמ).
OCR has 'דלא חייקינן שכולם יחטאו' but the image shows 'דלא חיישינן שכולם יחטאו'. The word should be 'חיישינן' (we do not suspect), which is the standard Talmudic term.
